name: cloudflare-images
description: Store and transform images with Cloudflare Images API and transformations. Use when: uploading images, implementing direct creator uploads, creating variants, generating signed URLs, optimizing formats (WebP/AVIF), transforming via Workers, or debugging CORS, multipart, or error codes 9401-9413. -H Authorization: Bearer <API_TOKEN> \ -H Content-Type: multipart/form-data \ -F file=@./image.jpg cf: { image: { width: 800, quality: 85, format: auto, gravity: face, zoom: 0.8 } } method: POST, body: f
